name: TheSimpleHandicap
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Simple Handicap is the most valuable three minutes of any NFL fan's morning! 

Adam Chernoff breaks down the NFL like nobody else. The Simple Handicap educates and explains what is needed to stay ahead of the league. 

Enable and add to your Flash Briefing now!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
